NOW_PLAYING_PORT_DESC: Changing this value will restart the Now Playing daemon. Default: 4004
NOW_PLAYING_URL_DESC: Access the Now Playing screen through this URL.
NOW_PLAYING_PREVIEW_URL_DESC: The Preview page lets you see the Now Playing screen in your browser at different sizes.
NOW_PLAYING_CONF_RESTART_CONFIRM: This will restart the Now Playing daemon. Proceed?
NOW_PLAYING_INVALID_PORT: Port number must be between 1024 and 65353
NOW_PLAYING_TRACK_INFO_MARQUEE_TITLE: Apply Marquee Effect on Track Info Title
NOW_PLAYING_ACTION_PANEL_TRIGGER_DESC: Note: Even if disabled, you can still bring up the Action Panel by swiping down on the Now Playing screen.
NOW_PLAYING_ICON_ANIMATE: - Animate (Filled or Outline Style Only; Increases CPU Usage)
NOW_PLAYING_LOCALE_SELECTION_INVALID: Please select a valid locale option
NOW_PLAYING_TIMEZONE_SELECTION_INVALID: Please select a valid timezone option
NOW_PLAYING_TZ_BY_GEO_COORD_NOT_FOUND: No timezone found for the given geographic coordinates. Client's timezone will be used instead.
NOW_PLAYING_WEATHER_SERVICE_DESC: Weather data is obtained from OpenWeather (https://openweathermap.org/). Remember to provide Geographic Coordinates under Localization to complete the Weather Service configuration.
NOW_PLAYING_WEATHER_CURRENT_ICON_ANIMATE: - Animate Current Weather (Filled or Outline Style Only; Increases CPU Usage)
NOW_PLAYING_UNSPLASH_KEYWORDS_APPEND_DAY: - Add Period of Day to Keywords
NOW_PLAYING_KIOSK_NOT_FOUND: Kiosk script not detected or could not be read.
NOW_PLAYING_KIOSK_SHOWING_DEFAULT: Kiosk script is currently set to show Volumio's default interface.
NOW_PLAYING_KIOSK_SHOWING_NOW_PLAYING: Kiosk script is currently set to show the Now Playing screen.
NOW_PLAYING_KIOSK_SHOWING_UNKNOWN: Kiosk script detected but its configuration could not be determined.
NOW_PLAYING_KIOSK_RESTORE_BAK_ERR: Error restoring kiosk script from backup
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_STARTUP_SCREEN: The default screen to display on startup.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_FONT: Place custom fonts in "/data/INTERNAL/NowPlayingPlugin/Fonts" (this directory appears as "<your Volumio>/internal storage/NowPlayingPlugin/Fonts" on the network). Supported formats: TTF, OTF, WOFF, WOFF2.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_CSS_PADDING: Value for CSS 'padding' property: top right bottom left (e.g. 20px 0px 10px 0px).
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_CSS_MARGIN: Value for CSS 'margin' property: top right bottom left (e.g. 0px 0px 5px 0px).
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_CSS_GRADIENT: CSS function for producing gradients. E.g. linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,0,0,0), rgba(255,0,0,1))
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_CSS_SIZE: Value applies to both CSS 'height' and 'width' properties (e.g. 30px).
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_ALBUM_ART_BORDER_RADIUS: Value for CSS 'border-radius' property (e.g. 10px). Note: might not have intended effect if Fit is set to 'contain'.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_MAX_LINES: The maximum number of lines to show before clamping.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_TRACK_INFO_ORDER: Assign a numerical value to a text info element to change its display order. Elements with lower values get displayed first.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_TRACK_INFO_MARQUEE_TITLE: If enabled, scrolls the track info title if it cannot be displayed fully. This setting ignores "Max Lines - Title" - marquees are always single-line. Also be aware that enabling this setting will increase CPU usage.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_DOCK_COMPONENT_ORDER: Assign a numerical value to a dock component to change its display order. Components with lower values in the same placement group get displayed first.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_IDLE_SCREEN: Whether to switch to Idle Screen after a period of player and user inactivity.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_IDLE_SCREEN_WAIT_TIME: Period of player and user inactivity to lapse before switching to Idle Screen (minimum 10 seconds; default: 30).
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_UNSPLASH_KEYWORDS: Request Unsplash to return images matching the specified keywords (e.g. 'Japan' or 'Landscape').
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_UNSPLASH_KEYWORDS_APPEND: If enabled, add the day period such as 'afternoon' or 'night' to keywords for matching.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_UNSPLASH_MATCH_SCREEN_SI: Request Unsplash to return images matching the screen size.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_UNSPLASH_REFRESH_INTERVA: Number of minutes to wait before refreshing. Minimum 10 (default), or 0 for no refresh.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_MY_BACKGROUND: Background image files are obtained from "/data/INTERNAL/NowPlayingPlugin/My Backgrounds"
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_MY_BG_RND_REFRESH_INTERV: Applies when My Background Image is set to "Random". Specifies the number of minutes to wait before refreshing. 0 for no refresh.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_CYCLE_INTERVAL_ALIGNMENT: Number of seconds to wait before switching to next alignment (minimum 10 seconds; default: 60).
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_BROADCAST_REFRESH: Sends a command to all active Now Playing screens to refresh themselves.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_KIOSK_RESTORE_BAK: You can try restoring it from a backup copy that had been configured to show Volumio's default interface.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_GENIUS_ACCESS_TOKEN: A Genius Access Token is required to access the plugin's metadata service.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_EXC_PARENTHESIZED: Exclude parenthesized words in metadata queries
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_TRANSITION_EFFECTS: Whether to enable transition effects such as fade-ins, fade-outs, screen-sliding, etc.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_UNMOUNT_SCREENS: When a screen is switched out, whether to remove it completely from the DOM instead of hiding it. When switching to a screen that was previously unmounted, it will be rebuilt and added back to the DOM. This is essentially a trade-off between screen-switching responsiveness and resource consumption. If you do not know what this means, it is better to leave this setting at 'Default'.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_DATE_TIME_FORMAT: Date and time formats are subject to the locale specified under Localization and may be disregarded.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_GEO_COORD: Geographic Coodinates are used by the Weather Service to obtain location-specific weather information, and can also be optionally used to determine the timezone.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_LOCALE: The locale affects how dates and times are represented, as well as the client's display language (if supported).
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_TIMEZONE: If you specified geographic coordinates, then you should set this to 'Match Geographic Coordinates'. Doing so will ensure that the date, time and weather are all displayed for the same location.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_CREATE_NEW_BACKUP: The name of the backup file. Backup files are saved in "/data/INTERNAL/NowPlayingPlugin/Settings Backups"
NOW_PLAYING_ERR_METADATA_NO_TOKEN: Token missing - Please provide a Genius Access Token in the Now Playing plugin settings.
NOW_PLAYING_ERR_WEATHER_MISCONFIG: Could not access weather service: missing geographic coordinates.
NOW_PLAYING_ERR_IDLE_SCREEN_WAIT_TIME: Wait time must be at least 10 seconds.
NOW_PLAYING_ERR_UNSPLASH_REFRESH_INTERVA: Refresh Interval must be at least 10 minutes, or 0 for no refresh.
NOW_PLAYING_ERR_CYCLE_INTERVAL: Cycle Interval must be at least 10 seconds, or 0 for default.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_QUERY_MUSIC_SERVICES: Whether to query the relevant music service plugin for metadata.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_ENABLE_SYNCED_LYRICS: If disabled, synced lyrics will be displayed as plain text.
NOW_PLAYING_DOC_SYNCED_LYRICS_DELAY: Shifts the synced lyrics timing (in milliseconds) forwards or backwards.
